channel.title: Need Help
channel.description:
Okay im having various problems doing things.
First, I wanna change what it says when you log in, and of course i know look in client, then control+f find it and change it, but what do i do after that because i saved it and it still doesnt change, one of my friends told me i need to compile, In my server folder there was no compile, just initlize and Build, and when i press " Build" it just says at top " Compiling"
Note: ./Stream.java uses or overrides a deppricated API. Note:Recompile with -Xlint:Deprecation for details. Press any key to continue.
Also having trouble getting my server on the server status list because it, says it will be on there if i keep it online, and my servers been online for 3 days now and it still hasnt shown up on there yet.

item.title: Need Help
item.dc:creator: @Fat_Cookies Fat Cookies
item.description:
@Fat_Cookies wrote:

http://java.sun.com/docs/books/tutorial/

'nuff said

item.title: Need Help
item.dc:creator: @GameMaster5 GameMaster5
item.description:
@GameMaster5 wrote:

how do i edit the server can you tell me please?

Read full topic

item.title: Need Help
item.dc:creator: @xxlukexx xxlukexx
item.description:
@xxlukexx wrote:

  1. if you mean, the text in the text box when you login, it is in client class.

search in there and there should be 1 for all playerrights, just change the text.

for this, its in your server folder, not your client folder.

your compiler works, when you changed you will need to click on the “build.bat” and it will compile.
i suggest you change it to make it say “compiler” so you do not get mixed up.

Read full topic
